messages.title: 3 reasons to back Sarah and her Lib Dem team
messages.content: Sarah has helped local people with over 15,000 through her local office. Sarah lives in Willesden and was the only Brent MP to refuse to claim money for a second home. Sarah puts Brent first. She has led local campaigns to save our Post Office, stop the closure local Police Stations and to get better transport links to our area.

mentions.tacticalSituation: You will have 2 ballot papers at this election. The white ballot paper is for our local MP. Mark this paper ONCE for Sarah Teather. The yellow ballot paper is for the local elections. Mark this paper THREE times for Sarah's team.

housing.content: Sarah lives in Willesden and was the only Brent MP to refuse to claim money for a second home.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sarah has helped local people with over 15,000 through her local office.

contactInformation.address: Printed by Park Communications and Alpine Way E6 6LA. Published and Promoted by Peter Hamilton on behalf of Sarah Teather (Lib Dem) and Brent Liberal Democrats at 1 High Road NW10 2TE
